Key: #Tools - those default tools to exclude and non-default tools to include
Notes: As of v1.6.0, all the 'config' type options deprecated in favour of tombiovis.opts set in top-level HTML
e.g. 'vis1, vis3' to remove the 'Two-column key' and 'Side-by-side comparison' visualisations
e.g. 'visEarthworm' to add a custom visualisation (must be installed to work)
e.g. 'vis2' to start the Identikit with the 'Single-column key' visualisation selected
If value set to 'yes' (lower case) validity checks and reporting will be carried out by the visualisation software.
Set to the name of a group specified on the characters tab to select this group by default (leave blank for group 'All')
